import React from 'react'; import './adminnav.css'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const AdminNavBar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Retrieve the logged-in user const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('currentUser')); // Handle logout functionality const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('currentUser'); // Clear the logged-in user data from localStorage navigate('/'); // Redirect to the home page }; return (
